last_episode_to_air.name: It's an Andyful Life
last_episode_to_air.overview: Andy wonders what his life would be like without Mark, leading to a series of dark events that could change his life forever.

name: Cavendish
overview: Mark and Andy return to Cavendish for the first time since childhood to care for their ailing father who runs The Museum of the Strange and Fantastic. They quickly find out that Cavendish is not like other towns, and while the brothers become embroiled in creepy misadventures, they soon realize their family dynamic hasnâ€™t changed much since they were kids.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Two bickering brothers, one a total slacker, the other a stickler for rules, return to their hometown of Cavendish, Canada to reunite with their estranged father after 30 years. However, weird things keep happening in town.

episodes.name: The Beast
episodes.overview: Mark and Andy return to Cavendish where a reunion with their estranged father is marred by a peculiar superstition.

episodes.name: The Annes
episodes.overview: Mark and Andy are cast in a local production of Anne of Green Gables but aren't prepared for the unusual commitment standards the director demands.

episodes.name: House of Wax
episodes.overview: A wax statue of Canadian icon Fred Penner brings trouble to the Museum and nearly drives Andy insane.

episodes.name: Carny Law
episodes.overview: When Mark wants to borrow money, Andy convinces him to get a job. Mark takes work in a traveling carnival and risks getting sucked into a lifestyle from which he may never return.

episodes.name: Charlottetown Nights
episodes.overview: A day trip to the big city turns into a dangerous nightmare for Mark, Andy and Molly when they get lost in a rough part of Charlottetown.

episodes.name: The Coven
episodes.overview: When Mark is kicked out of a coven of witches for creative differences, he vows to destroy something Andy holds dear.

episodes.name: The Story of Ruth
episodes.overview: After Rollie suffers yet another heart attack, Andy hires a caregiver who seems perfect.

episodes.name: It's an Andyful Life
episodes.overview: Andy wonders what his life would be like without Mark, leading to a series of dark events that could change his life forever.
